availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Mary Ann Proctor Utley in Mercer County, Kentucky, on February 24, 1835. Father of William Utley, Sally Ann Utley, Thomas Utley, Lucy Utley, Elisabeth Utley, Lucy Utley, and John Utley. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 34.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191854.
Find A Grave, "Clarkson Utley (1803-February 8, 1877)," Memorial #86116959, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86116959 (accessed August 13, 2018).
